participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.message:
There are two ways of approaching this scenario.

We could show stats and make metrics up for them that prove its better.

We can tell them to do an internal comparison on their data and see which they prefer.


I personally will always chose the latter. They can’t argue agaisnt their own results. It also makes them put some effort into the equation.
Now the larger question is why are they asking? Is it because they don’t believe us? Is it because they need to justify it internaly?

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: They need this for a presentation tomorrow to SLT to make the case that they should be able to use MSFT ocr in prod

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: they  just want any information we have to back up our suggestion for them to use it.
How much detail do they want?
Let me build a repo and show the clear differences and I’ll share it and send it over

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: :raised_hands:  that would be awesome! Thank you!
